entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
